mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.bill_id AS "billId", b.bill_number AS "billNumber", c.customer_name AS "customerName", c.membercard AS "memberCard", a.payment_number AS "paymentNumber", a.payment_time AS "paymentTime", a.payment_type AS "paymentType", a.payable AS "payable", a.amount AS "amount", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN f_bill b on b.id=a.bill_id LEFT JOIN Crm_customer c on c.id=b.customer_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO f_payment( id, bill_id, payment_number, payment_time, payment_type, payable, amount, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{billId}, #{paymentNumber}, #{paymentTime}, #{paymentType}, #{payable}, #{amount}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE f_payment SET bill_id = #{billId}, payment_number = #{paymentNumber}, payment_time = #{paymentTime}, payment_type = #{paymentType}, payable = #{payable}, amount = #{amount}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
